hero.title: Southern Wisconsin Multifamily Expert
hero.subtitle: Helping investors buy and sell apartment buildings across Milwaukee, Madison, and surrounding markets.

markets.lead: Coverage for all of southern wisconsin

items.name: Milwaukee
items.blurb: Established multifamily core with diverse renter base and steady trades.

items.name: Madison
items.blurb: University & state employment anchor; resilient fundamentals.

items.name: Racine & Kenosha
items.blurb: IL/WI commuter corridor with value-add opportunities.

items.name: Waukesha
items.blurb: Strong incomes, suburban product, stable rent growth.

items.name: Brown County
items.blurb: Green Bay metro; reliable demand and investor-friendly price points.

subscribe.title: Subscribe to Multifamily Max Invest
subscribe.lead: Stay informed and sign up for our newsletter to receive in-depth construction reports, expert deal packages, and valuable insights for making informed investment decisions.

services.lead: We help owners price, position, and sell with confidence. Boutique speed, local data, and a deep investor network deliver clean execution and maximum value.

items.title: Seller Representation
items.body: BOV, pricing strategy, confidential/off-market options, targeted marketing, negotiation, and diligence through close.

items.title: Buyer Representation
items.body: On- and off-market sourcing, underwriting support, lender introductions, and offer strategy.

items.title: Valuations
items.body: Asset and development-site valuations to inform refinancing, partner discussions, or go-to-market decisions.

items.title: Market Insights
items.body: Comps, cap rates, rent trends, and supply/demand snapshots tailored to each submarket.

items.title: Local Network
items.body: Vetted lenders, attorneys, property managers, and inspectors to move fast and de-risk execution.

items.title: Portfolio Planning
items.body: Hold/sell analysis, 1031 timelines, and long-term planning for generational owners and syndicators.

about.title: Meet Max Fiascone
about.body: I help owners of 5â€“100 unit properties across Southern Wisconsin price and sell with confidence. Focused on secondary and tertiary submarkets where local relationships and data matter most.

contact.intro: Contact us today for any of your multifamily needs. We're here to help!
